game.name: Alien Snap
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Captions available, Custom Volume Controls, Mouse Only Option, Playable without Timed Input, Save Anytime, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Explore an alien planet, snap pictures of wildlife and build relationships with your crewmates in this cozy sci-fi Point & Click - Visual Novel.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Explore an alien planet, snap pictures of wildlife and build relationships with your crewmates in this cozy sci-fi Point & Click - Visual Novel.
